abstract: Baltimore County police release video showing suspect Keith H McLeod  moving aggressively toward police officer before officer shot and killed him.
lead_paragraph: The Baltimore County police released a video that showed a man suspected of using a forged drug prescription moving aggressively toward an officer, who shot and killed him.

headline.main: Baltimore County Police Release Shooting Video

snippet: The Baltimore County police released a video that showed a man suspected of using a forged drug prescription moving aggressively toward an officer, who shot and killed him.
